title: Pixel 3a lost the connection with my pc, when I tried to fastboot unlock that
content:
I tried to fastboot unlock my pixel 3a, because I would like to install android 9.0. We build apps, so we would like to test that with different os.

Currently the phone has android 11 os.
So I did the unlocking manual steps: https://source.android.com/setup/build/running#booting-into-fastboot-mode

I saw a lot of different article and videos, but when I would like to use the "fastboot flashing unlock" command, my device didn't recognized the connectivity with my computer.

So here is the command list what I did:
- Download the platform-tools
- call platform-tools>adb devices
List of devices attached
03QAYV2EFH      device
- call the platform-tools>adb reboot bootloader command
- after that the phone went to fastboot mode
- call the fastboot flashing unlock command. The command gave me an aswer:
platform-tools>fastboot flashing unlock
< waiting for any device >

Somehow when my device went to fastboot mode, the phone lose the connection with my PC.

Could you help me ?

Thanks Gabor
